Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils

Provides utility methods to be used by the application

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCJsonBeanUtils
    Provides utilities to convert a json string to a java bean and vice versa
    Conversion Rules:
    Only Java Beans can be converted/created using the utilities provided in this class All Java primitives, Dates, Strings are treated as simple JSON attributes Date attributes in json have to be in the ISO Date Time format.
    SCUIApplicationCacheHolder
    This class should contain all the cached and static object which are specific to any application.
    SCUIApplicationCacheManager
    This class manages cache holder for all the applications deployed.
    SCUIContextHelper
    SCUIContextHelper class is the class that helps in accessing the SCUIContext.
    SCUIDojoDataTypeUtil  
    SCUIErrorCleanupUtils  
    SCUIJSONUtils  
    SCUIRequestWrapper  
    SCUIResponseWrapper  
    SCUIUtils  
    SCUIWidgetEventUtil  
    SCXmlBeanDateConverter
    Utility class which handles the date conversion during xml to java conversion and vice versa.
    SCXmlBeanUtils
    Provides utilities to convert a XML document to a java bean and vice versa
    Conversion Rules:
    Only Java Beans can be converted/created using the utilities provided in this class All Java primitives, Dates, Strings are treated as attributes Date attributes in XML have to be in the ISO Date Time format.
    SimplePool<T>
    Provide a caching pool of objects to use.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SCUIJSONException
    Runtime Exception mostly used to wrap JSONException.

Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils Description
